languages.text: "Надеюсь, твои клинки наточены — час великой битвы близок".
"I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, твои клинки наточены — час великой битвы близок".

traits.locale_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."
"I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."
"I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."
"I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."

languages.text: 「刃は研ぎ澄まされているのだろうな？間もなく大戦がはじまるぞ」
languages.original_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."

traits.locale_text: 「刃は研ぎ澄まされているのだろうな？間もなく大戦がはじまるぞ」

languages.text: “希望你的刀已经磨得足够锋利，伟大的战斗即将到来。”
languages.original_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."

traits.locale_text: “希望你的刀已经磨得足够锋利，伟大的战斗即将到来。”

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Eure Klingen sind geschärft — die Stunde der großen Schlacht naht."
languages.original_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Eure Klingen sind geschärft — die Stunde der großen Schlacht naht."

languages.text: «Espero que tus hojas estén bien afiladas. Se acerca la gran batalla».
languages.original_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que tus hojas estén bien afiladas. Se acerca la gran batalla».

languages.text: « J'espère que vos lames sont affûtées, car l'heure de la grande bataille approche. »
languages.original_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vos lames sont affûtées, car l'heure de la grande bataille approche. »

languages.text: "Umarım kılıçlarını bilemişsindir. Büyük savaşın vakti yaklaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "I hope your blades have been sharpened — the hour of the great battle is near."
